course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Message Passing Algorithms for Compressed Sensing
course.description: This is an independent course on the applications of Message Pass Algorithms on Compressed Sensing.  It will be based on the following two papers: 1. Donoho, D., Maleki, A., & Montanari, A. (2011). How to Design Message Pass Algorithms for Compressed Sensing. 2. Donoho, D.L., Maleki, A., & Montanari, A. (2009). Message-passing algorithms for compressed sensing. Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
